Welcome to my Pac-Ripper channel! I love doing cool EXPERIMENTS every day, so I create new and exciting videos for you! I use the machine to grind things and I like to combine ingredients to see what happens!

If you like my videos please LIKE and SUBSCRIBE)


DENIAL OF RESPONSIBILITY:
All food used in our videos is expired and no animals were harmed.
WARNING: Crash testing experiments can be dangerous! Don't try to do this yourself!
